mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOSPITAL ( HOST_IDX , Y_KIHO , YADM_NM , ADDR , EMDONG_NM , TEL_NO , CL_CD , CL_CD_NM , SIDO_CD , SIDO_CD_NM , SGGU_CD , SGGU_CD_NM , POST_NO , X_POS , Y_POS ) VALUES ( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HOSPITAL) + 1 , '${ykiho}' , '${yadmNm}' , '${addr}' , '${emdongNm}' , '${telno}' , '${clCd}' , '${clCdNm}' , '${sidoCd}' , '${sidoCdNm}' , '${sgguCd}' , '${sgguCdNm}' , '${postNo}' , '${XPos}' , '${YPos}' )
